issue.subject: WFS : Feature Types can not be listed for policy definition
issue.description:
When defining a policy for a WFS virtual service, the Feature Type list of the capabilities document can not be parsed if the XML document doesn't used a default namespace. Parsed OK : 


...


    
         ... 
         ... </Abstract>
        <Keywords> ... </Keywords>
        <SRS ... </SRS>

...
</pre>

Can not be parsed : 
<pre>
<wfs:WFS_Capabilities version='1.0.0' xsi:schemaLocation='http://www.opengis.net/gml 
                                                          http://schemas.opengis.net/gml/2.1.2.1/feature.xsd 
                                                          http://www.opengis.net/ogc 
                                                          http://schemas.opengis.net/filter/1.0.0/filter.xsd 
                                                          http://www.opengis.net/wfs 
                                                          http://schemas.opengis.net/wfs/1.0.0/WFS-capabilities.xsd' 
xmlns:wfs='http://www.opengis.net/wfs' 
xmlns:ogc='http://www.opengis.net/ogc' 
xmlns:gml='http://www.opengis.net/gml' 
xmlns:xsi='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance' 
xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' xmlns:gva_GVA='http://localhost:6080/arcgis/services/gva/GVA/MapServer/WFSServer'>

...

<wfs:FeatureTypeList>
		<wfs:FeatureType>
			<wfs:Name> ... </wfs:Name>
			<wfs:Title> ... </wfs:Title>
			<wfs:SRS> ... </wfs:SRS>
...

</pre>

Both cases are correct and must be handle by the easySDI service component.
